parameters.name: ClientToken
parameters.description: The client token that is used to ensure the idempotence of the request. You can use the client to generate the token, but you must make sure that the token is unique among different requests The **token** can contain only ASCII characters and cannot exceed 64 characters in length. For more information, see [How to ensure idempotence](~~25693~~).

parameters.name: Description
parameters.description: This parameter is no longer used. Use `Permissions.N.Description` to specify the description of security group rule N.

parameters.name: DestCidrIp
parameters.description: This parameter is no longer used. Use `Permissions.N.DestCidrIp` to specify the destination IPv4 CIDR block.

parameters.name: IpProtocol
parameters.description: This parameter is no longer used. Use `Permissions.N.IpProtocol` to specify the transport layer protocol.

parameters.name: Ipv6DestCidrIp
parameters.description: This parameter is no longer used. Use `Permissions.N.Ipv6SourceCidrIp` to specify the source IPv6 CIDR block.

parameters.name: Ipv6SourceCidrIp
parameters.description: This parameter is no longer used. Use `Permissions.N.Ipv6SourceCidrIp` to specify the source IPv6 CIDR block.

parameters.name: NicType
parameters.description: This parameter is no longer used. Use `Permissions.N.NicType` to specify the network interface type.

parameters.name: Permissions
parameters.description: Security group rule N. Valid values of N: 1 to 100.

parameters.name: Policy
parameters.description: This parameter is no longer used. Use `Permissions.N.Policy` to specify whether to allow inbound access.

parameters.name: PortRange
parameters.description: This parameter is no longer used. Use `Permissions.N.PortRange` to specify the range of destination ports.

parameters.name: Priority
parameters.description: This parameter is no longer used. Use `Permissions.N.Priority` to specify the rule priority.

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description: The region ID of the security group. You can call the [DescribeRegions](~~25609~~) operation to query the most recent region list.

parameters.name: SecurityGroupId
parameters.description: The ID of the security group.

parameters.name: SourceCidrIp
parameters.description: This parameter is no longer used. Use `Permissions.N.SourceCidrIp` to specify the source IPv4 CIDR block.

parameters.name: SourceGroupId
parameters.description: This parameter is no longer used. Use `Permissions.N.SourceGroupId` to specify the ID of the source security group.

parameters.name: SourceGroupOwnerAccount
parameters.description: This parameter is no longer used. Use `Permissions.N.SourceGroupOwnerAccount` to specify the Alibaba Cloud account that manages the source security group.

parameters.name: SourceGroupOwnerId
parameters.description: This parameter is no longer used. Use `Permissions.N.SourceGroupOwnerId` to specify the ID of the Alibaba Cloud account that manages the source security group.

parameters.name: SourcePortRange
parameters.description: This parameter is no longer used. Use `Permissions.N.SourcePortRange` to specify the range of source ports.

parameters.name: SourcePrefixListId
parameters.description: This parameter is no longer used. Use `Permissions.N.SourcePrefixListId`to specify the ID of the source prefix list.
